message: If you want a carry a gun, fine. But why do you HAVE to have it out in the open. Yeah we get it, you love your guns. Do you necessarily have to have to strapped over your back? If you were really concerned about your safety, you'd just be glad to have it on you regardless if its hidden. Having it out in the open makes people tense up. Whether you have good intentions or not.
